Table LIB Author - Field Country - Property Caption

Table LIB Author - Field No. Series - Property Caption

trans-unit.source: Specifies the Open Researcher and Contributor ID in format: 0000-0000-0000-0000.

Table LIB Author - Field ORCID - Property Caption

trans-unit.source: ORCID must be in format: 0000-0000-0000-0000 (four groups of four digits separated by hyphens).
trans-unit.target: L'ORCID doit être au format : 0000-0000-0000-0000 (quatre groupes de quatre chiffres séparés par des traits d'union).
trans-unit.note: Table LIB Author - Field ORCID - Method OnValidate - NamedType InvalidFormatErr

Table LIB Author - Field VIAF ID - Property Caption

trans-unit.source: ISBN must contain only numbers and hyphens.

Table LIB Book - Field Publication Year - Property Caption

trans-unit.source: Publication year must be between 1 and %1.

trans-unit.source: Book Loan %1 has already been posted.
trans-unit.target: Le prêt de livre %1 a déjà été validé.
trans-unit.note: %1 = Document No.
Codeunit LIB Book Loan-Post - NamedType AlreadyPostedErr

trans-unit.source: There are no lines to post for Book Loan %1.
trans-unit.target: Il n'y a aucune ligne à valider pour le prêt de livre %1.
trans-unit.note: %1 = Document No.
Codeunit LIB Book Loan-Post - NamedType NoLinesErr

trans-unit.source: Member No. must have a value in Book Loan Header: No.=%1. It cannot be zero or empty.
trans-unit.target: N° membre doit avoir une valeur dans En-tête prêt de livre : N°=%1. La valeur ne peut pas être zéro ou vide.
trans-unit.note: %1 = Document No.
Codeunit LIB Book Loan-Post - NamedType NoMemberErr

trans-unit.source: Do you want to post the book loan?

trans-unit.note: Codeunit LIB Book Loan-Post (Yes/No) - NamedType ConfirmPostQst
